com.ash.input.console

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ash.input.console.Console
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A customized console-application that supports coloring and multiple command modification and addition via CommandParserInterfaces.

      • requestInput

        public void requestInput(Console.InputAvailableListener ial)
        Wait for a user input. A InputAvailable event will be fired to the given Console.InputAvailableListener on submission.
        Only allows one listener at a time
        Parameters:
        ial -

      • ignoreInput

        public void ignoreInput()
        Blocks/Cancels the input request. Will reset the listener so it must be reassigned.
